price: Oggas Nuti (adabbii) dachaa kan jireenyaatiifi (adabbii) dachaa du’aa si dhandhamsiifna ture. Ergasii ati Nurraa tumsaa hin argattu.
arabic: إِذٗا لَّأَذَقۡنَٰكَ ضِعۡفَ ٱلۡحَيَوٰةِ وَضِعۡفَ ٱلۡمَمَاتِ ثُمَّ لَا تَجِدُ لَكَ عَلَيۡنَا نَصِيرٗا

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: idhan la-adhaqnāka ḍiʿ'fa al-ḥayati waḍiʿ'fa al-mamāti thumma lā tajidu laka ʿalaynā naṣīran
